SnippetName: Ansible variable output via set stats
Description: A sample snippet for defining execution variables with Ansible
Snippet:
- name: make data available to rest of flow
      set_stats:
        data:
          num_settable: 99.9
          int_stat: 42 
          float_stat: 4.2
          true_stat: true
          string_stat: 'this is a string'
          list_stat:
            - 'hello'
            - 'world'
